Text: RE reimbursementwas Paid to date is and I have an additional to submit Hopefully they will pay even though the insurance declined to cover it So that leaves a balance of and we will owe Sharon or so by the end of this month Depending on what happens after that we might have another or so from Sharon by the last of December Best guess or so we need to cover somewhere Original Message From mailto Sent Monday October PM To Subject Re reimbursement Does that take into account that more money may be going into the spending account I think we have a total of allocated for the year My records indicate that Ive put in as of my last paycheck Love Kay Neil Mann on PM Please respond to To C Kay Mann Email Kay nroncom cc Subject reimbursement I just received the EOBs back on Sharon Seals They will not pay If the reimbusement account pays it will leave about in the account I will try to get the form completed tonight and in the mail tomorrow NM
Michaelphone number is She offered the following times to meet Wed pm Thurs am Wed am Her email is

RE MichaelCharlotte will pick Michael up tomorrow and I will pick him up today Do you want me to confirm with Sharon for tomorrow or will you Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday May AM To Subject Re Michael Can we swap days with Charlotte and go tomorrow We need her to pick up Michael if we are going to go together ckm Neil Mann on AM Please respond to To C Kay Mann Email Kay nroncom cc Subject Michael Sharons phone number is She offered the following times to meet Wed pm Thurs am Wed am Her email is

RE Charlottejust got off the phone with Paige she is going to the game with Mikey and the boys I will confirm with Charlotte we will pick Michael up after the game correct NM Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday May PM To Subject Charlotte Im on a conference call Could you call Charlotte ASAP and review the plan for tonight Paige is in her car if you need her input ckm

michaelI forgot to call you this past weekend regarding Michael He has an appointment with Sharon Tuesday and Paige is taking him for me Im taking my mom to the doctor Tuesday morning so I will be out of the office in the am If you are open Saturday I may try to take Kay out Saturday night NM

RE Deerfield Development Review Committee Hearing June this Deerfield in Mississippi Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday June AM To Subject Deerfield Development Review Committee Hearing June th fyi Forwarded by Kay MannCorpEnron on AM From Steven nronXgate on AM To Ben nronXgate Eric nronXgate Steven nronXgate Dave nronXgate Kay nron Raimund nronXgate Lea nronXgate nronXgate nronXgate nronXgate nronXgate nronXgate nronXgate nronXgate nronXgate nronXgate nronXgate nronXgate nronXgate cc Subject Deerfield Development Review Committee Hearing June th Please plan to attend the hearing next Monday the th at pm at Deerfield Beach City Hall Should everything go well this will be the only public hearing in Deerfield We will be getting with each of you regarding presentational material etc Also please plan to attend a premeeting atKeith Associates Monday at am Regards Steve

RE Michaels Performance Formwas out of the office yesterday and apologize for the delay in responding Im not sure about classtype Michael does see Sharon Seals and Associates SpeechLanguage Pathologists once a week for hour The only testing has been from Danny Williamson Developmental Pediatrician who is an associate of Nancy LaFever This was an eval for ADHD He was also tested by SBISD for the same issue Williamson and LaFever have all this information in his file Thanks for you help with this Neil Original Message From Kara Norris mailto Sent Monday June PM To Subject Michaels Performance Form Hi Neil Michael looked so happy to see you for chapel today Thanks for being there I have a few questions in order to complete this form It asks a couple of questions about the help he is receiving outside of school If you could answer them for me I can have this turned in tomorrow Classification Type Hours per Week Has Michael received any testing from the outside help speechlanguage specialist Today Michael told me that I would have to come over soon because he would be going far away from St Francis for summer camp If he is adamant about us getting together outside of school I would be happy to meet you and Michael or Michael and Kay or his sister for a lunch date somewheresometime this summer Let me know Once again I have really enjoyed getting to know your family See you at the party Wednesday at Kara Get your FREE download of MSN Explorer at

RE Michaels Performance Formwas but she wrote outside of school Sorry Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday June AM To Subject RE Michaels Performance Form Neil I thought you were going to tell her to just answer that he gets nothing at school She has no independent information on the rest and shouldnt worry about providing that info to them Neil Mann on AM Please respond to To Kara Norris cc Subject RE Michaels Performance Form I was out of the office yesterday and apologize for the delay in responding Im not sure about classtype Michael does see Sharon Seals and Associates SpeechLanguage Pathologists once a week for hour The only testing has been from Danny Williamson Developmental Pediatrician who is an associate of Nancy LaFever This was an eval for ADHD He was also tested by SBISD for the same issue Williamson and LaFever have all this information in his file Thanks for you help with this Neil Original Message From Kara Norris mailto Sent Monday June PM To Subject Michaels Performance Form Hi Neil Michael looked so happy to see you for chapel today Thanks for being there I have a few questions in order to complete this form It asks a couple of questions about the help he is receiving outside of school If you could answer them for me I can have this turned in tomorrow Classification Type Hours per Week Has Michael received any testing from the outside help speechlanguage specialist Today Michael told me that I would have to come over soon because he would be going far away from St Francis for summer camp If he is adamant about us getting together outside of school I would be happy to meet you and Michael or Michael and Kay or his sister for a lunch date somewheresometime this summer Let me know Once again I have really enjoyed getting to know your family See you at the party Wednesday at Kara Get your FREE download of MSN Explorer at
jackhas to go to the vet before he can go to the kennel

stuffgood morning grandma just called she will be calling you to say thanks for the christmas tree she really likes it i should get her a water probe so she wont over water i think i will check on jack at lunch i think i will put him in his crate for the rest of the day love nm

RE Hi thereyoure right wonder what the deal is got an email from Lu he and bev have invited the manns and the parkers for drinks friday night at the bayou bend towers i will thank them but tell them we will be out of town Original Message From Mann Kay mailtoKay NRONcom Sent Monday November AM To Subject FW Hi there Just kinda seems like they could come in separate cars if they really wanted to spend some time Original Message From Lisa Clarke mailto Sent Sunday November PM To Mann Kay Subject Hi there Hey Sorry I missed your call I was at the mall with the girls I really dont like to shop Bobby mentioned that Beverlys house will be available over Thanksgiving Itll be good to have the extra elbow room Odds are that Bobby and I may still stay at the bed and breakfast just because I like it so much I feel so spoiled when I stay there It looks like we are just barely going to be able to be in Palacios Bobby is working Wednesday so I think we are going to come in on Thursday I grimace at the thought of spending twice as much time just getting out of Austin I think well get up and leave early on Thursday and try to get there by late morning Then of course we need to come back on Friday to Bobby get ready to hop the pond What do we need to bring as far as plates plastic silver ware and all that good stuff Of course well bring cokes and beer and stuff like that but what else is needed Well also bring some smoked turkey and dressing for Thursday too We can have a smorgasbord for our meal And since we have access to Beverlys house I can warm stuff up over there so as not to get in anyones way Im looking forward to seeing yall again We are sorry we cant be there longer but were glad to get to be there some Let me know what else I need to bring Hope youve had a good weekend Love Lisa This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
choci just realized michael didnt get anything for her if you will ask him what he wants to give her i will pick it up

FW Fwd Taliban vs TexansOriginal Message From Tom Vandivier mailto Sent Wednesday December AM To Ann Brodnax Carleton Wilkes Jerry Mazzaferro jessica vandivier Laura Vandivier Neil Mann Phil Tinker Ron Brock Sonja Vandivier Stewart and Becky Williams Subject Fwd Taliban vs Texans Inline attachment follows From To Kopecky Lewis OENRONOUNACNRECIPIENTSCNNOTESADDRCNBBACDFEACBBCC Michael Bible Email Michael luorcom Tom Vandivier Email Wade Trimble Email Date Wednesday December GMT Subject A large group of Taliban soldiers are moving down a road when they hear a voice call from behind a sand dune One Texas soldier is better than ten Taliban The Taliban commander quickly sends of his best soldiers over the dune whereupon a gun battle breaks out and continues for a few minutes then silence The voice then calls out One Texan is better than one hundred Taliban Furious the Taliban commander sends his next best troops over the dune and instantly a huge gunfight commences After minutes of battle again silence The Texan voice calls out again One Texan is better than one thousand Taliban The enraged Taliban Commander musters one thousand fighters and sends them across the dune Cannon rocket and machine gun fire ring out as a huge battle is fought Then silence Eventually one wounded Taliban fighter crawls back over the dune and with his dying words tells his commander Dont send any more men its a trap Theres two of them
